content_descriptors.notes:
The Girls of your Dreams contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Sex Scenes (consensual/non consensual sex, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters.
-Sex with magical and mythical creatures (Orcs, Monster Girls, succubus & angels.)
-Cartoon/Fantasy Violence (combat with weapons in a text based format, turnbased combat)
-Drug and Alcohol (one scene where a potion is used to seduce a character)
-BDSM scenes involving characters in a sexual nature (bondage etc.)
-All characters in The Girls of your Dreams are 18+ and over

name: The Girls of your Dreams Demo
